result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Scott L. Hamernik

records.addlTxt:
$200.00 cash bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.  
Self.
Commitment for Failure to Furnish Bail.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody on bench warrant and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail. The matters are continued for preliminary hearing on 9-19-22 at 10:45 am in Branch 1.  The recognizance bond previously furnished is modified to $200 cash bond with all prior conditions. Cash bail not furnished and defendant is remanded into custody. Commitment for failure to furnish bail issued. Copy filed.
Bench warrant with service of officer thereon.
Minutes.
DEFENDANT IS TO BE REMANDED TO THE JAIL. DEFENDANT IS TO BE DENIED BY PUBLIC DEFENDER FOR SPECIAL BAIL APPEARANCE. DEFENDANT MUST REPORT IMMEDIATELY TO THE JAIL FOR BOOKING.

10:22 am - Prosecuting attorney Anthony A. Lambrecht appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Scott L. Hamernik not in court.  Attorney Carl W Knepel in court for Scott L. Hamernik. State requests warrant. Court authorizes warrant.  No return on warrant allowed.
Preliminary hearing on August 10, 2022 at 10:15 am.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody on bench warrant and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The matters are continued for preliminary hearing 8-10-2022 at 10:15 AM in Branch 1.  $1500 recognizance bond previously furnish is continued with all prior conditions. Court orders photos and prints at MTPD.
Bench warrant with service of officer thereon.
Minutes.

ADDRESS INFO for Scott L. Hamernik
Current: 435 N 10th Street, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States  (Effective: 08-03-2022)
Prior: 812 S. 10th Street, Manitowoc, WI 54220
DEFENDANT IS TO BE REMANDED TO THE JAIL. DEFENDANT IS TO BE DENIED BY PUBLIC DEFENDER FOR SPECIAL BAIL APPEARANCE. DEFENDANT MUST REPORT IMMEDIATELY TO THE JAIL FOR BOOKING.

10:02 am - Prosecuting attorney Anthony A. Lambrecht appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Scott L. Hamernik not in court.  Attorney Carl W Knepel in court for Scott L. Hamernik. State requests warrant. Court authorizes warrant.  No return on warrant allowed.

Defendant demands a preliminary hearing.   Preliminary hearing is set for 08-02-22 at 10:00 a.m.   
Minutes.
Re:  Felony bail jumping, repeater, on 07-02-22.
Order to report to MTPD for photo and prints

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.  The State informs the Court that the defendant will be charged with the crime of misdemeanor bail jumping, felony bail jumping and possess drug paraphernalia.  The matter is continued for initial appearance on 07-25-22 at 1:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $1,500.00 recognizance bond with the conditions that he report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and identifying information within 48 hours or, if incarcerated, within 72 hours of release, defendant is to have no contact with Walmart in Manitowoc, WI or its premises, defendant must maintain absolute sobriety and defendant is not to possess any alcoholic beverages.  Bail furnished and defendant is released from custody.
Minutes.
